Author: J.K. Rowling
Description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and attends Hogwarts

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Description: A hobbit sets off on a grand adventure with dwarves to reclaim treasure from a dragon

Author: Dan Brown
Description: A symbologist races to stop a deadly virus based on Dante’s Inferno

Author: Paulo Coelho
Description: A shepherd dreams of finding treasure and learns about life’s purpose

Author: James Clear
Description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones using science
